February 12, 2025

Can your database handle a billion customers per month?

On this episode, Ryan chats with Charlie Yang, CTO of Oceanbase, about how their consensus-based distributed database handles over a billion customers per month. They discuss the benefits of the native distribution paradigm of Oceanbase, how production and analytics data can live in the same data store, and how distributed data stores can manage the massive data needs of AI.

Episode notes:

OceanBase is an open-source distributed database. Check it out on GitHub.

For more information, follow OceanBase on LinkedIn, X, and YouTube.

To connect with Charlie Yang, find him on LinkedIn.

Got questions about OceanBase? Join the discussion here on Stack Overflow.
